short_summary: Procurement for storage boxes for the Department of National Defence
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), is procuring 1,000 storage boxes that include the delivery of the goods. The detail of the requirement is found in the solicitation.
full_summary:
### Storage Boxes for Department of National Defence (DND)
#### Requisition Information
- **Reference Number:** WS4606316254-Doc4630312028
- **Solicitation Number:** WS4606316254
- **Publication Date:** 2024-06-11
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-12T14:00:00
- **Amendment Number:** 8
- **Amendment Date:** 2024-07-03

#### Project Details
- **Project Title:** Storage boxes for DND
- **Project Description:** Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of storage boxes, including delivery.
- **Location:** Quebec
- **Delivery Area:** Quebec

#### Contract Information
- **Procurement Category:** Goods
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
- **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

#### Bid Information
- **Bid Status:** Expired
- **Bid Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price
- **Bid Submission Method:** This is a closed bid opportunity. Potential bidders must submit bids in writing.

#### Key Contracts
- **Contracting Entity:** Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
- **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
- **Contact Person:** Corine Lavoie, corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Contact Phone Number:** [Not provided]
- **Contact Fax:** [Not provided]

#### Resources
- **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19985728?extsite=MTk5ODU3MjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
- **Bidder Meeting/RFP Selection:** Not applicable for this request

\*\*Vendor Information and Requirements 

Please refer to [**Materials and Specifications**}], [**Terms and Conditions**],and [**Additional Vendor Contacts**]for more information on this opportunity. 

To learn more about this bid opportunity and bid submission requirements, please visit [**Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)**]. 

Company titles, business names, job titles, addresses, etc., are always written in title case.
